dataRoles.name: location
dataRoles.description: Geographic location identifier for Choropleth layer

dataRoles.name: color
dataRoles.description: Measure or Dimension to color circles and heatmaps.  Can be numeric or text data type.

dataRoles.name: size
dataRoles.description: Measure to control circle radius size. Must be numeric data type.

dataRoles.name: cluster
dataRoles.description: Measure to aggregate points for clustering.  Must be numeric data type.

accessToken.description: Public Access Token from your Mapbox account - get yours at https://www.mapbox.com/account

labelPosition.description: Position of the labels compared to data points.

styleUrl.description: Mapbox URL to a custom style you created on your Mapbox account.  See https://www.mapbox.com/help/studio-manual/ for a guide on creating map styles in Mapbox Studio

apiUrl.description: Default URL for map api requests.  Set this to your Mapbox Atlas server hostname.

dropPin.description: Should a pin be added to the map after search

zoom.description: Zoom level to set after search

radius.description: Optional number greater than or equal to 0. Units in pixels.

scaleFactor.description: The scale factor to use when sizing circles relative to zoom level.

opacity.description: The global opacity in percentage at which the layer will be drawn.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the circle's stroke. Strokes are placed outside of the Circle Radius.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the circle's stroke.

strokeColor.description: The stroke color of the circle.

minColor.description: Defines the color for the minimum value of the color field.

midColor.description: Defines the color for the center value of the color field.

maxColor.description: Defines the color for the maximum value of the color field.

minValue.description: Minimum value to consider for colors

midValue.description: Center value to consider for colors

maxValue.description: Maximum value to consider for colors

highlightColor.description: Defines the color a polyon will take when highlighted.

minZoom.description: Minimum zoom level layer is visibile at.

maxZoom.description: Maximum zoom level layer is visibile at.

radius.description: Radius of influence of one heatmap point in pixels. Increasing the value makes the heatmap smoother, but less detailed.

intensity.description: Controls the intensity of the heatmap globally.

opacity.description: The global opacity in percentage at which the heatmap layer will be drawn.

minColor.description: Minimum color for heatmap color ramp.

midColor.description: Center color for heatmap color ramp.

maxColor.description: Maximum color for heatmap color ramp.

minZoom.description: Minimum zoom level layer is visibile at.

maxZoom.description: Maximum zoom level layer is visibile at.

radius.description: Radius of the smallest cluster circles.

clusterMaxZoom.description: Maximum zoom level to cluster points.

minColor.description: Defines the color for the minimum value of the color field.

maxColor.description: Defines the color for the maximum value of the color field.

strokeWidth.description: The width of the circle's stroke. Strokes are placed outside of the Circle Radius.

strokeOpacity.description: The opacity of the circle's stroke.

strokeColor.description: The stroke color of the circle.

minZoom.description: Minimum zoom level layer is visibile at.

maxZoom.description: Maximum zoom level layer is visibile at.

minColor.description: Defines the color for the minimum value of the color field.

midColor.description: Center color for choropleth color ramp.

maxColor.description: Defines the color for the maximum value of the color field.

minValue.description: Minimum value to consider for colors

midValue.description: Center value to consider for colors

maxValue.description: Maximum value to consider for colors

highlightColor.description: Defines the color a polyon will take when highlighted.

height.description: Defines height for 3d extrusion multiplied by 1000

minZoom.description: Minimum zoom level layer is visibile at.

maxZoom.description: Maximum zoom level layer is visibile at.

maxLevel.description: Number of different levels used for drilldown

data1.description: Select a boundary tileset.  Select from Global Countries, USA States, and USA Postcodes; or create your own boundaries by uploading shapes to your Mapbox account.  See https://www.mapbox.com/help/studio-manual-uploads/ for a tutorial on how to upload your own boundaries.  Email help@mapbox.com to ask about access to global administrative and postal boundaries.

vectorTileUrl1.description: The URL of the vector tileset. Example for US states: mapbox://mapbox.us_census_states_2015

sourceLayer1.description: The id of the vector layer to use for data join

vectorProperty1.description: The property name in the vector layer to use for data join

opacity.description: The global opacity in percentage at which the layer will be drawn.

outlineColor.description: The outline color of the filled areas.

outlineWidth.description: The width of the outline of the filled areas.

outlineOpacity.description: The global opacity in percentage at which the outline will be drawn.

raster.description: Raster Tile layer settings from a WMS or ZXY tile url.

url.description: The URL to load the raster tiles source from in WMS or ZXY format.  You must hide then show this layer for your raster source to see the changes from this field while developing  For an example WMS url compatible here, see https://docs.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/example/wms/ - note that the `?bbox={bbox-epsg-3857}` URL parameter is required in a WMS URL.

rasterTileSize.description: The tile size in pixels of your rasters (256 or 512).  You must hide then show this layer to show the changes from this field while developing.

opacity.description: The global opacity in percentage at which the layer will be drawn.

minZoom.description: Minimum zoom level layer is visibile at.

maxZoom.description: Maximum zoom level layer is visibile at.
